description: Models datasets spaces and tooling for building AI apps

name: Yupp AI
description: Yupp AI allows users to explore, compare, and test over 500 AI models side by side. It includes a credit-based system, enabling free trials while rewarding usage with bonus credits.

name: Runway ML
description: Runway ML is a creative AI platform offering image, video, and audio generation and editing. It provides 125 free credits with 720p exports (watermarked) and supports advanced features like Gen-2 video-to-video.

name: Genspark (Super Agent)
description: Genspark is a super-agent platform that lets users build apps, generate slide decks, make calls, and more directly from prompts. It integrates multiple AI capabilities into a single assistant environment.

name: Assista AI
description: Assista AI automates workflows across 100+ apps using plain language commands. It enables users to connect apps, move data, and trigger actions without coding.

name: Ideogram
description: Ideogram is an AI art tool focused on typography-rich image generation. It excels at creating posters, logos, and designs with sharp text integration alongside visuals.

name: Freepik AI Image Generator
description: Freepik AI Image Generator lets users create up to 20 images per day for free using multiple AI models. It’s optimized for creative projects, illustrations, and marketing visuals.

name: Descript
description: Descript is an AI-powered all-in-one tool for editing audio and video like a text document. Features include transcription, overdubbing, Studio Sound, screen recording, and AI-generated video highlights.

name: AI Studio (Google/Meta)
description: AI Studio enables developers and creators to prototype with Gemini (Google) or LLaMA (Meta). It provides tools for designing custom AI characters, agents, and apps through an easy-to-use interface.

name: NotebookLM (Google)
description: NotebookLM is Google’s AI-powered smart notebook that allows users to upload documents, sources, and media, then chat with them. It generates summaries, study guides, and even Audio Overviews, making it ideal for researchers and students.

name: GLM-4.5 (Zhipu AI)
description: GLM-4.5 by Zhipu AI is an open-weight large language model designed for advanced reasoning, coding, and multilingual understanding. It offers high performance across benchmarks, with open access for developers and enterprises.

name: Quiq
description: Quiq is a conversational AI platform that unifies SMS, WhatsApp, and web chat support. Its AI bots qualify requests, escalate to agents, and improve messaging workflows.

name: e-bot7
description: e-bot7 provides AI chatbots and agent-assist features for customer support. It reduces average handling time and supports multilingual interactions in enterprises.

name: Netomi
description: Netomi is an AI customer service platform that automates email, chat, and messaging support. It offers deep integrations with CRMs and ticketing systems for enterprise-grade support.

name: Solvemate
description: Solvemate offers AI chatbots designed for instant FAQ automation. Its decision-tree AI improves accuracy by combining scripted flows with NLP-driven conversations.

name: Inbenta AI
description: Inbenta provides AI chatbots, search, and FAQ automation. Its natural language processing capabilities allow businesses to deliver instant answers across web and mobile apps.

name: LivePerson AI
description: LivePerson AI powers conversational commerce and support bots across messaging channels. It integrates with enterprise systems to automate sales and service conversations.

name: Aisera
description: Aisera delivers AI-driven service automation for IT and customer support. It integrates with ticketing systems to provide conversational AI and self-service options.

name: Observe.AI
description: Observe.AI is a contact center intelligence platform that analyzes customer conversations. It provides agent coaching, QA automation, and compliance monitoring using AI.

name: Re:amaze AI
description: Re:amaze integrates AI into its customer support suite for small businesses. It offers automated replies, workflows, and intent detection across chat, email, and social media.

name: Heyday by Hootsuite
description: Heyday is an AI chatbot platform for retail and ecommerce. It handles FAQs, product discovery, and personalized recommendations through messaging channels like Facebook and WhatsApp.

name: ResolveAI
description: ResolveAI automates repetitive support requests, generates AI macros, and suggests solutions for unresolved tickets. It reduces backlog and supports agent productivity.

name: Gladly Sidekick
description: Gladly’s Sidekick AI chatbot helps brands provide personalized support. It connects with customer profiles to automate responses and route complex issues to human agents.

name: Forethought SupportGPT
description: SupportGPT by Forethought automates customer query resolution using generative AI. It reads support knowledge bases, suggests answers to agents, and powers self-service.

name: Zoho Desk Zia AI
description: Zoho Desk includes Zia AI for customer support. Zia predicts ticket resolution times, suggests solutions, and provides AI-based sentiment analysis for incoming requests.

name: Helpshift
description: Helpshift is a mobile-first customer support AI tool. It integrates in-app messaging, automation, and self-service chatbots, making it popular in gaming and mobile apps.

name: Thankful
description: Thankful offers AI customer service automation for large enterprises. Its AI agents handle high-volume support requests, ticketing, and escalations while maintaining brand voice.

name: Certainly
description: Certainly is an AI ecommerce support assistant that automates pre-sales questions, order tracking, and returns. It integrates with Shopify and Magento to improve CX for retailers.

name: Lang.Ai
description: Lang.Ai automates ticket tagging and routing using natural language understanding. It classifies support conversations, prioritizes urgent requests, and reduces manual triage.

name: Kustomer IQ
description: Kustomer IQ, part of Meta, adds AI to the Kustomer CRM platform. It provides smart ticket routing, intent detection, and proactive customer insights to improve resolution speed and personalization.

name: Tidio AI
description: Tidio AI combines live chat and AI chatbots for small and mid-sized businesses. It handles FAQs, qualifies leads, and integrates with Shopify, WordPress, and ecommerce platforms.

name: Ultimate.ai
description: Ultimate.ai offers AI-powered virtual agents that integrate into CRMs and ticketing platforms. It automates repetitive tasks and supports multilingual customer interactions across global teams.

name: Ada
description: Ada is a no-code AI customer support platform that allows businesses to design conversational flows. It powers self-service chatbots that integrate into websites, apps, and messaging channels.

name: Intercom Fin AI
description: Intercom’s Fin AI is a conversational chatbot designed for customer support. It leverages natural language understanding to resolve FAQs, integrate with help centers, and escalate to agents when necessary.

name: Freshdesk Freddy AI
description: Freshdesk integrates Freddy AI to provide automated ticket triage, intent detection, and conversational chatbots. It helps companies resolve customer issues faster while reducing manual effort for agents.

name: Zendesk AI
description: Zendesk AI enhances Zendesk’s customer service platform with intelligent ticket routing, AI-powered bots, and automated macros. It reduces agent workload and ensures faster, more accurate resolutions across email, chat, and voice channels.

name: TestGPT
description: TestGPT is an AI tool that auto-generates unit and integration tests. It reads your codebase, predicts test cases, and integrates into CI/CD pipelines.

name: CodexGLUE
description: CodexGLUE is a benchmark and dataset suite for evaluating AI coding models. It helps researchers assess code generation quality and functionality.

name: Regex.ai
description: Regex.ai generates regular expressions from natural language prompts. It also explains regex patterns in plain English to help developers debug and learn.

name: GitFluence
description: GitFluence helps developers learn git commands by describing actions in plain English. It returns accurate git CLI commands with explanations.

name: PolyCoder Playground
description: PolyCoder Playground is an experimental web IDE for testing the PolyCoder model. It enables developers to try AI code completions in-browser.

name: CodeParrot
description: CodeParrot is an open-source code generation model by Hugging Face. It’s trained on GitHub data and useful for research, autocomplete, and language model fine-tuning.

name: Tabula
description: Tabula is an AI tool for code documentation. It generates inline comments, docstrings, and README drafts for repositories, improving maintainability.

name: CodeAssist
description: CodeAssist is a natural language-to-code IDE assistant. It allows developers to chat with their IDE to generate functions, fix bugs, and refactor code.

name: ExplainDev
description: ExplainDev provides AI-powered explanations of code directly inside IDEs and pull requests. It helps junior developers and reviewers understand changes faster.

name: Pieces for Developers
description: Pieces is an AI productivity tool that captures, enhances, and retrieves code snippets. It uses AI to recommend snippets during development and integrates with IDEs.

name: HeySQL
description: HeySQL converts natural language to SQL queries in seconds. It’s built for product managers, analysts, and non-technical users who need quick database insights.

name: Spellbox
description: Spellbox is an AI coding tool that generates code snippets from plain English descriptions. It is lightweight and designed for quick coding tasks.

name: CodeSnippets AI
description: CodeSnippets AI is a developer productivity tool that generates reusable snippets from prompts. It integrates into IDEs and stores snippets for teams to share.

name: ExplainThisCode
description: ExplainThisCode helps developers understand unfamiliar codebases by generating natural language explanations of functions, classes, and scripts.

name: AI DevTools
description: AI DevTools is a suite of developer utilities with AI code generation, regex builders, JSON formatters, and test case creators. It’s designed for quick, small dev tasks.

name: Text2Code
description: Text2Code is a lightweight AI tool that converts natural language to code snippets across multiple programming languages, making it useful for quick prototyping.

name: SQLAI.ai
description: SQLAI.ai is an AI SQL assistant that generates, explains, and optimizes queries. It integrates with data warehouses and BI tools for analytics teams.

name: AI2SQL
description: AI2SQL turns natural language into optimized SQL queries. It supports MySQL, PostgreSQL, and other databases, enabling non-technical users to query databases easily.

name: CodePal
description: CodePal is an AI tool for generating, reviewing, and explaining code. It also provides SQL generation and regex creation from natural language prompts.

name: Cursorless
description: Cursorless is an open-source voice-driven coding tool. It allows developers to write and navigate code hands-free using natural language commands and speech recognition.

name: IntelliJ AI Assistant
description: The IntelliJ AI Assistant adds AI-driven code completions, doc generation, and inline explanations. It supports Java, Kotlin, and enterprise frameworks inside JetBrains IDEs.

name: PyCharm AI Assistant
description: JetBrains integrates AI into PyCharm with completions, doc explanations, and test generation. It improves productivity for Python developers with context-aware code help.

name: Intellicode
description: Visual Studio IntelliCode enhances Microsoft’s IDE with AI-powered code suggestions based on patterns learned from open-source projects. It supports C#, Python, and other languages.

name: DeepDev
description: DeepDev is a research-focused AI code completion tool that leverages transformer models for developers. It enables autocomplete, error correction, and syntax-aware completions.

name: AIXcoder
description: AIXcoder is an AI pair programming assistant for Java, Python, and more. It provides smart code completions, refactoring, and supports enterprise self-hosting for data privacy.

name: Deep TabNine
description: Deep TabNine is the advanced AI completion engine that preceded modern Copilot-like tools. It supports multiple languages and delivers inline suggestions based on large code models.

name: WindSurf
description: Windsurf is an AI-native IDE designed to simplify coding workflows. It combines autocomplete, debugging, and agent-like assistants in a developer-friendly environment.

name: OpenAI Codex
description: Codex is OpenAI’s code generation model that powers GitHub Copilot. It converts natural language into code across many languages and supports code explanations and completions.

name: Sourcery
description: Sourcery refactors and improves Python code automatically. It reviews functions and classes, suggesting cleaner and faster implementations for better readability.

name: Codeium
description: Codeium is a free AI code completion and search tool supporting 70+ programming languages. It integrates into popular IDEs and emphasizes developer productivity at scale.

name: Safurai
description: Safurai is an AI coding assistant designed for debugging, refactoring, and explaining code. It integrates into VS Code to help developers resolve errors quickly.

name: CodeWP
description: CodeWP is an AI coding assistant specialized for WordPress. It generates PHP, JS, and CSS snippets tailored for WP sites, saving time for developers and designers.
